T02D1393:29b-1: sr'i k'a la tsakra ga na tsakro p'a yi k'a bi dhi /
T02D1393:29b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1393:29b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1393:29b-5: de yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni rigs sum cu so drug gi dpa' bo dang /
T02D1393:29b-6: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug rnams kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bya ste /
T02D1393:29b-7: de yang dang por gdan bsham pa ni /
T02D1393:29b-8: dbus su ba lang dang phag gi pags pa'i stan la /
T02D1393:29b-9: shes rab dang bcas pa'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1393:29b-10: slob dpon bsdad cing mi'i pags pa'i snod do //
T02D1393:29b-11: de'i g-yas phyogs su mi'i pags pa'i steng du g-yung mo'o //
T02D1393:29b-12: phyogs rnams la khyi dang rta dang ba lang dang /
T02D1393:29b-13: glang po'i pags pa'i stan rnams la dmangs rigs ma dang ;
T02D1393:29b-14: rgyal rigs ma dang bram ze ma dang /
T02D1393:29b-16: mtshams rnams kyi byang shar nas dri chu dang dri
T02D1393:29b-17: chen dang khrag dang rkang rnams kyi snod rnams so
T02D1393:29b-18: // de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor
T02D1393:29b-19: ba'i phyogs rnams su lug dang nags kyi khyi dang
T02D1393:29b-20: rnga mo dang 'dam seng gi pags pa rnams la
T02D1393:29b-22: au ma pa'i steng du gar byed ma dang /
T02D1393:29b-24: khron pa byed ma rnams so //
T02D1393:29b-25: mtshams rnams la ra dang ri dags dang bong bu
T02D1393:29b-26: dang phag pa'i pags pa'i stan rnams la tha ga
T02D1393:29b-30: de nas gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams la chu srin dang /
T02D1393:30a-9: de nas bzhi pa'i yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs rnams
T02D1393:30a-10: su bse dang stag dang dred dang sre mong rnams
T02D1393:30a-11: kyi pags pa la lcags ma gar ma dang /
T02D1393:30a-14: mar khu mkhan ma rnams so //
T02D1393:30a-15: mtshams rnams su me'i mtshams nas 'bri dang ce spyang dang /
T02D1393:30a-17: byi la'i pags pa rnams la smyug mkhan ma dang /
T02D1393:30a-21: yongs su bskor ba lnga pa la /
T02D1393:30a-24: sa li dza ta ka dang /
T02D1393:30a-25: sbre'u rnams la kla klo ma dang /
T02D1393:30a-29: mtshams kyi me mtshams nas ri bong dang gzugs mo dang /
T02D1393:30a-30: ai shu ka pa shu dang /
T02D1393:30a-31: sbal pa rnams la ko skya ma dang /
T02D1393:30a-35: pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa'o //
T02D1393:30a-36: lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa'o //
T02D1393:30a-37: nub dang rlung du glang po che'i pags pa'o //
T02D1393:30a-38: byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa'o //
T02D1393:30a-40: rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams ma lus pa gos dang bral ba /
T02D1393:30a-41: skra grol ba phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1393:30a-42: me rnams kyi g-yas rnams su dpa' bo yang de
T02D1393:30a-43: rnams dang mnyam par phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pas
T02D1393:30a-44: / de rnams la pags pa'i gdan sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1393:30a-45: de nas btung ba'i snod ni shar dang mer nya phyis so //
T02D1393:30a-46: lho dang lho nub tu na ri ke la'i snod do //
T02D1393:30a-47: nub dang rlung du kham phor ro //
T02D1393:30a-48: byang dang dbang ldan du mi'i thod pa'o //
T02D1393:30a-49: dbus su shing gi phor pa rnams so //
T02D1393:30a-50: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas rnams ni lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1393:30a-51: gdan gyi srog chags sum cu so drug gi stobs rnams dang /
T02D1393:30a-52: chu la spyod pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1393:30b-22: pags pa'i bya chen po dang /
T02D1393:30b-28: aam pa ri ka rnams kyi stobs te 'di rnams
T02D1393:30b-29: ni mkha' la spyod pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas sum
T02D1393:30b-55: rnag rnams te kha dog sna tshogs dang /
T02D1393:30b-63: rdul rnams te 'di rnams ni sems can rnams kyi lus kyi dam tshig go //
T02D1393:30b-81: lha bshos rnams ni snod du bzhag ste phyogs 'tshams brgyad du gzhag go //
T02D1393:30b-82: de nas slob dpon gyis srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom
T02D1393:30b-83: pa sngon du song bas stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D1393:30b-84: su bdag nyid kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer las
T02D1393:30b-85: spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo mchod pa
T02D1393:30b-87: thugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1393:30b-88: de rnams kyang lha'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02D1393:30b-89: de nas slob dpon gyis sngon du song ba'i dam tshig gi rdzas dang /
T02D1393:30b-92: zan la sogs pa sngon du bzhag la gtor ma sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1393:30b-94: aom badzra kro dhi shva ri sarba dra bya ni
T02D1393:30b-95: bi shva dha ya h'um phat ces pas bdud rtsi
T02D1393:30b-96: lnga myos byed kyis bzhu bar bya ste bsang gtor
T02D1393:31a-1: de nas srin lag gis blangs nas /
T02D1393:31a-2: gru gsum byas pa'i dbus su mandala zlum po byas pa dang /
T02D1393:31a-3: de la ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ngo //
T02D1393:31a-4: de nas srin lag gis blangs nas /
T02D1393:31a-5: sngon du song ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1393:31a-6: de nas sdig ba bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1393:31a-7: 'dod ba'i don la gsol ba gdab pa byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1393:31a-8: de nas zhing skyong rnams la sngon du song ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin la /
T02D1393:31a-9: de nas aom ha ri ti pi nda kam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1393:31a-10: aom d'u ti ki aa gr'a sam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1393:31a-12: po nya dag la chang zan dang bud yi ge
T02D1393:31a-13: gsum mngon par bzlas te sa la bzhag nas bza'
T02D1393:31a-14: ba zos pa dang sbyin no //
T02D1393:31a-15: de nas yon bdag gis mandala byas te ci bde bar gsol bar zhu zhes so //
T02D1393:31a-16: de nas las kyi rdo rjes bla ma la gus pas /
T02D1393:31a-17: bag yod pa dang dam tshig gi rdzas de rnams gus pa dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1393:31a-18: myos byed kyi snod padma'i phyag gis drang bar bya zhing /
T02D1393:31a-19: len bas kyang padma'i lag kor gyis so //
T02D1393:31a-20: slob dpon la thams cad nyis 'gyur du drang bar bya'o //
T02D1393:31a-21: de rnams kyi myos byed kyi phud dang por slob
T02D1393:31a-22: dpon la phul te phyag byas la btung bar bya'o
T02D1393:31a-23: // gnang ba ma byin bar du myos byed sa la mi gzhag cing /
T02D1393:31a-24: sa la bzhag na gcig la gcig padma'i lag pas blang bar bya'o //
T02D1393:31a-25: de ltar stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa dang
T02D1393:31a-26: ldan pa btung ba dang bza' ba dang bca' ba
T02D1393:31a-27: rnams 'dren pa'i dus su di dag gis brjod pa
T02D1393:31a-28: / chos rnams rang bzhin rnam bar dag / de la the tshom ma byed par //
T02D1393:31a-29: bram ze khyi dang gdol ba rnams //
T02D1393:31a-30: rang bzhin gcig tu bza' bar gyis //
T02D1393:31a-31: bde gshegs chos rnams zag pa med //
T02D1393:31a-32: nam mkha' dang mtshungs dri ma med //
T02D1393:31a-33: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams dang bral //
T02D1393:31a-37: /'khor lo'i gtso bos ma gnang bar //
T02D1393:31a-38: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba min //
T02D1393:31a-39: lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02D1393:31a-40: bya ba thams cad dal gyis bya //
T02D1393:31a-41: gzhan du rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur //
T02D1393:31a-42: 'gro bar 'dod na 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa la phyag byas nas gnang ba zhu ba'o //
T02D1393:31b-0: @31b 'jug pa'i dus su phyag byas pa'o //
T02D1393:31b-1: de ltar mnyam par bzhag pas longs spyod do //
T02D1393:31b-2: stobs dang myos byed la sogs pas shes pa bteg
T02D1393:31b-3: na bla ma las rjes gnang thob pa dang yid
T02D1393:31b-4: du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i glu cung zad smad la
T02D1393:31b-5: blang ba ni / lha de dang de'i phyag rgya dang gar dang bcas pas so //
T02D1393:31b-6: de nas stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa bza'
T02D1393:31b-7: ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byas nas dang
T02D1393:31b-8: / so so'i gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02D1393:31b-9: zur gyi mig gis sdug pa'i lta bas blta bar bya zhing /
T02D1393:31b-10: mthol mkhregs pa'i nu ma dang padma lag pa'i padmas
T02D1393:31b-11: reg cing mchu gzhib cing 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1393:31b-13: 'dir rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis tha
T02D1393:31b-14: snyad kyi ngo tsha dang rigs dang rigs min la
T02D1393:31b-15: sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs te /
T02D1393:31b-16: so so'i gnas na gnas pa'i sring mo la sogs pa sna dang rna ba dang /
T02D1393:31b-17: mchu la sogs pa chad pa dang gzugs ngan pa
T02D1393:31b-18: la sogs pa rnams de ru 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1393:31b-19: pa rnams kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
T02D1393:31b-20: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kyang ngo //
T02D1393:31b-21: de yang lang tsho ma gang zhig autpala'i spyan dang
T02D1393:31b-22: ldan pas slob dpon dang dpa' bo rnams dang bcas
T02D1393:31b-23: pa'i rdo rje la mchod pa byed na /
T02D1393:31b-24: de'i bsod nams kyis gzhi dang /
T02D1393:31b-25: glang po che dang rta dang bu mo la sogs
T02D1393:31b-26: pa dpag tu med pa phul bas kyang mchog tu
T02D1393:31b-27: 'gyur ro // 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis phyag
T02D1393:31b-28: dang mtshan ma dang rigs kyi dbye ba la sogs
T02D1393:31b-29: pa gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
T02D1393:31b-30: de nas stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa la longs spyod pa 'di ltar thams cad bya ste /
T02D1393:31b-32: zos pa dang 'thungs pa'i lhag ma slob dpon gyis sdud du bcug la /
T02D1393:31b-33: mdun du bzhag la slar yang myos byed la sogs
T02D1393:31b-34: pa blugs te sngags gsum gyis mngon par byin gyis
T02D1393:31b-35: brlabs pa'i chang gis kha phru btab la /
T02D1393:31b-36: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1393:31b-38: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhag ma'i gter ma la ste /
T02D1393:31b-39: mar me dang bcas pas phyi rol du gtong du gzhug go //
T02D1393:31b-40: de nas gos zung dang lag gdub dang rna rgyan
T02D1393:31b-41: la sogs pa dang dri zhim po dang bcas pa'i
T02D1393:31b-42: so rtsi la sogs pa gtso bo dang dpa' bo
T02D1393:31b-43: dang dpa' mo rnams la dbul lo //
T02D1393:32a-2: bsod nams 'di yis sems can grangs med khams gsum
T02D1393:32a-3: la gnas rnams kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D1393:32a-4: thob par shog / ces pas yon gyi bdag bo
T02D1393:32a-5: la smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02D1393:32a-6: de nas lhag ma lus pa dong du sba bar bya'o //
T02D1393:32a-7: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo sa bdag rgyal po'am gzhan gyis bya ba'o //
T02D1393:32a-8: de las gzhan pa ni tshogs pa'i bye brag ji
T02D1393:32a-9: ltar rnyed pa'i tha ma la pa'i bud med dam
T02D1393:32a-11: lnga'am bcu gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam rtsa
T02D1393:32a-12: dgu'am yongs su rdzogs pa la snyan gsan phab ste
T02D1393:32a-13: / ji ltar rnyed pa'i gdan la sogs pa la de ltar thams cad bya'o //
T02D1393:32a-14: de nas dpa' bo'i ston mo ni rdul tshon gyi
T02D1393:32a-15: dkyil 'khor med na dbus su ba lang gi lci
T02D1393:32a-16: bas gru bzhi pa byas te /
T02D1393:32a-17: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba
T02D1393:32a-18: la sogs pa slob dpon gyis snga ma ltar byas
T02D1393:32a-19: la / de yang tshogs kyi gtso bo shar du phyogs pa'o //
T02D1393:32a-20: de'i g-yon du phyag rgya gcig yon bdag gis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1393:32a-21: gzhan du na phyag rgya dang bral ba'i chang btung ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1393:32a-22: de'i g-yas phyogs su slob dpon dge slong rnams kyi gral shar du kha phyogs pas so //
T02D1393:32a-23: bden bral du slob dpon dge tshul rnams byang du kha phyogs pas so //
T02D1393:32a-24: de'i dbang ldan du slob dpon khyim pa rnams lhor kha phyogs pas so //
T02D1393:32a-25: de ltar dge slong ma dang dge tshul ma dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1393:32a-26: tshogs kyi gtso mo'i g-yon du dpa' bo gcig yon bdag gis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1393:32a-27: gzhan du na thabs dang bral ba'i stobs kyis bza' ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1393:32a-28: lhag ma snga ma dang mtshungs so //
T02D1393:32a-29: 'di ni dpa' bo'i ston mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02D1393:32a-30: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
